# Not
<!-- This file was generated - DO NOT CHANGE IT MANUALLY -->



Excel NOT(logical_value): Reverses the logical value. Logical_value is any value to be reversed.

## Parameter

### Function name

The name of the Excel function

- ID: `functionName`
- Datatype: `string`
- Default Value: `NOT`





## Advanced Parameter

`None`
